author: stas
msg: Make it possible to run TEST (or another driving script) from any path

author: stas
msg: one more re-configure fix: vhosts cache needs to be invalidated as early

author: stas
msg: checks whether some .in files have changed (or the derivatives don't
yet exist) and the rest. So that we don't try to generate the files twice
causing misterious config errors. since extra_conf_files_needing_update is
called from more than one place.

author: stas
msg: If at least one *conf*.in files is modified since the last
configuration, make sure to regenerate them all, so the right ports
